personalInfo.name: Thanakorn Buathongtanakarn
personalInfo.bio: I’m a student developer interested in building things that solve real-world problems. Beyond code, I explore research and photography, using both analysis and visual storytelling to understand systems, people, and impact.

projects.title: ฺBone Fracture and Anomalies Detection
projects.description: An AI-powered tool designed to automatically detect and classify bone fractures in X-ray images.Built using Python, TensorFlow, YOLOv7 and ResNet50 for deep learning classification.

projects.title: HER2 Attention Classifier
projects.description: Deep learning framework for predicting HER2 receptor status in breast cancer from H&E whole-slide images using attention-based CNNs.

competitions.title: Young Scientist Competition - 2026
competitions.description: Created a proof of concepts for a Deep Learning with Multiple Instance Learning to predict HER2 status in breast cancer from H&E whole-slide images.

competitions.title: TESET 2025
competitions.description: Competitive English test assessing reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills for non-native speakers.

competitions.title: The Outsmarter, MEDSWU 2024
competitions.description: General knowledge quiz competition in medicine and health science in MEDSWU EduFest.
